audioText: Je voudrais apprendre le piano, mais je n'ai pas assez de temps libre.
question: What does the speaker want to do?
explanation: The text states 'Je voudrais apprendre le piano, mais je n'ai pas assez de temps libre' - I would like to learn piano, but I don't have enough free time. 'Voudrais' is the conditional form of 'vouloir' (to want).
